title: How to borrow an eBook from the library - Quora

response.answer_text: Do you have a valid card with that library? The library website has a list of available ebook titles and directions on how to borrow one. You'll be given a borrowing period (maybe three weeks) and possibly a renewal opportunity when the ebook is due. Or call the library and talk with one of the clerks or librarians about this. Btw, your card might be valid at other libraries too, so look for that information or ask about that if you call.
